organization.content:

Paragraph: But Singapore had the support of other WTO members .

1. WTO (World Trade Organization)

The term "WTO members" refers to the organizations that are part of the World Trade Organization. Therefore, the "Organization" entity in the paragraph is the World Trade Organization (WTO).
